content: परवत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Dependent upon or subject to another, ready to obey; सा बाला परवतीति मे विदितं <ls>Ś. 3. 1</ls>; भगवन्परवानयं जनः <ls>R. 8. 81</ls>; <ls n="R.">2. 56</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> with <ab>instr.</ab> or <ab>loc.</ab> of person; भ्रात्रा यदित्थं परवानसि त्वं <ls>R. 14. 59.</ls> {@--2@} Deprived of strength, rendered powerless; परवानिव शरीरोपतापेन <ls>Māl. 3.</ls> {@--3@} Completely under the influence of (another), not master of oneself, overpowered or overcome; विस्मयेन परवानस्मि <ls>U. 5</ls>; आनंदेन परवानस्मि <ls>U. 3</ls>; साध्वसेन <ls>Māl. 6.</ls> {@--4@} Devoted to.
